title: Osaka WaiWai!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Hey, hey, Yoshiko-chan, can I have some more of that secret remedy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, me too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not Yoshiko, it’s Yohane. If I just hand it out to you two like that, it wouldn’t be a secret potion anymore!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eh~. But it was so tasty, that peach-flavored cough drop...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, Ruby-chan, you should call it a secret remedy, remember?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Oh, right! I’m sorry, Yoshiko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Don’t apologize!! There’s no helping it, huh... So, you two can’t calm your nerves without Yohane’s secret remedy...... Here.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Thanks! Munch.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Delicious~! With this, I’m going to do my rubesty today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wait a minute! It’s a fallen angel’s secret remedy, you know! You should say something more dramatic!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
